description: Configure FortiSwitch logging (logs are transferred to and inserted into FortiGate event log).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Severity.description: Severity of FortiSwitch logs that are added to the FortiGate event log. Valid values: `emergency`, `alert`, `critical`, `error`, `warning`, `notification`, `information`, `debug`.

Status.description: Enable/disable adding FortiSwitch logs to FortiGate event log. Valid values: `enable`, `disable`.

Vdomparam.description: Specifies the vdom to which the resource will be applied when the FortiGate unit is running in VDOM mode. Only one vdom can be specified. If you want to inherit the vdom configuration of the provider, please do not set this parameter.
